question:
Which of the following statements about the recently held sporting event Asian Airgun Championship 2019 is / are correct?
  1. The venue of the event was Pyongyang
  2. Top 3 teams in the medal and points tally were India, Chinese Taipei and Singapore.
  3. The Coach of the Indian Team was Suma Shirur.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Asian Airgun Championship 2019 has been held in the Chinese Taipei city of Taoyuan. India topped the Championship by bagging most number of gold medals and highest points in the points tally. India bagged 14 gold, 5 silver and 4 bronze medals. As a team India scored 1882 points. Some of the prominent winners from Indian campaign were Mehuli Ghosh, Shreya Agarwal , Keval Prajapati, Aishwarya Singh Tomar, Yash Vardhan etc. Â The team was coached by Suma Shirur.
